## SparkbarProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SparkbarProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [barGap?](./components.sparkbarprops.bargap.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Gap between bars on the chart |
|  [barWidth?](./components.sparkbarprops.barwidth.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Width of each bar on the chart |
|  [data](./components.sparkbarprops.data.md) |  | unknown\[\] | Array of data to plot as bars |
|  [height](./components.sparkbarprops.height.md) |  | number | Height of the chart in pixels |
|  [id](./components.sparkbarprops.id.md) |  | (d: unknown) =&gt; string | Accessor function that accepts a datum and returns an id string |
|  [marked?](./components.sparkbarprops.marked.md) |  | (d: unknown) =&gt; boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Special indicator for a data point to highlight above and beyond normal selection. |
|  [nodata?](./components.sparkbarprops.nodata.md) |  | (d: unknown) =&gt; boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Accessor function that accepts a datum and returns whether it is a no data placeholder |
|  [onClick?](./components.sparkbarprops.onclick.md) |  | (d: unknown) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> Click handler for datum bars |
|  [selected?](./components.sparkbarprops.selected.md) |  | (d: unknown) =&gt; boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Selected datum to highlight on the chart |
|  [value](./components.sparkbarprops.value.md) |  | (d: unknown) =&gt; number | Accessor function that accepts a datum and returns the plottable value |
|  [width](./components.sparkbarprops.width.md) |  | number | Width of the chart in pixels Note that there is no validation that the number of bars at specified width will fit |
|  [xScale?](./components.sparkbarprops.xscale.md) |  | (d: unknown, i: number) =&gt; number | <i>(Optional)</i> Scale for x position |
